body:
This is just a small information post regarding the teams we have on Avicus. This is to show new players the teams they can apply for.

Note: If I forgot a team, please post your team page (must have at least 10 members).


Apollo - https://avicus.net/teams/888
Forum Page:
https://avicus.net/forums/discussions/8801761fd

Endless Aptitude -  https://avicus.net/teams/733
Forum Page: 
https://avicus.net/forums/discussions/9febe76e6

Necromancy - https://avicus.net/teams/928
Forum Page:
https://avicus.net/forums/discussions/c3b9cf86e

Cronus - https://avicus.net/teams/965
Forum Page: 
https://avicus.net/forums/discussions/6ac2a88c8

Xenarch - https://avicus.net/teams/688
Forum Page:
https://avicus.net/forums/discussions/587cc8026

China Baby Toes - https://avicus.net/teams/849
Forum Page:
https://avicus.net/forums/discussions/2556e6312

Jalapenos - https://avicus.net/teams/540
Forum Page:
https://avicus.net/forums/discussions/1ce5e74a6

Emoji - https://avicus.net/teams/1050
Forum Page:
https://avicus.net/forums/discussions/2d4d18368

Team Allah - https://avicus.net/teams/24
No Thread

Eternal Cross - https://avicus.net/teams/445
Forum Page:
https://avicus.net/forums/discussions/e672d4247

Sagrevyum - https://avicus.net/teams/791
Forum Page: 
https://avicus.net/forums/discussions/8cae1faf8

Proximity - https://avicus.net/teams/922
Forum Page;
https://avicus.net/forums/discussions/eebc8e46b

The Crazy Beaners - https://avicus.net/teams/647
Forum Page: 
https://avicus.net/forums/discussions/b8ffea044

Cacalmarin - https://avicus.net/teams/49
Forum Page: https://avicus.net/forums/discussions/ed3ac37bd

Enjoy!

title: The List of current Avicus Teams

replies.body: Nice!
replies.body_tagged: Nice!

replies.body:
You forgot Calcamarin, Grapes Crew, Heartless, Wizerdz, Varisty, TRIPLESKO, Proximity, Uber, Ohio, Black Hole, Scorpians, 
QueDizi, Impact, and xxoemyixx.
replies.body_tagged:
You forgot Calcamarin, Grapes Crew, Heartless, Wizerdz, Varisty, TRIPLESKO, Proximity, Uber, Ohio, Black Hole, Scorpians, 
QueDizi, Impact, and xxoemyixx.

replies.body:
Added Caccalmarin.
Proximity = Proxy
Grapes Crew isn't a competitive team

Unsure about Heartless

Other teams are teams that only are active during tournaments (ocn) then disappear after them so they don't count. I'll wait for them to make a forum thread for applications or to see if they are active after TM3

This forum page is for teams that are active here that you can attempt to trial for or apply for. Not just the "first page teams".

replies.body:
Actually no, this post was made with the purpose to see what teams are currently active and looking for members while in the /teams page you can't see if a team are LFM.

And also Edans gives you the post to watch the LFM application (if there is one).

P.S yes I know your post can be with sarcasm but whatever :P
